title: Just created a new NBA Jam Announcer pack for LOL

embed.description: The audio is slightly delayed in the video for some reason, its perfect in game. Enjoy

body:
The audio is slightly delayed in the video for some reason, its perfect in game. Please upvote if you Enjoyed.

I've also changed the "Welcome to SR" intro from the original video to play the Space Jam theme. A demo is here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZShMCawEgHU&feature=youtu.be



Also check out my other announcer pack,
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/GqMQf4u1-lol-announcer-pack-return-of-the-flamboyant



> **DOWNLOAD LINK:**  https://www.dropbox.com/s/hvubaisll24mzex/LOL%20NBA%20Jam%20Announcer%20Pack%20by%20I%20Autolocked.rar?dl=0

Dunkmaster {{champion:122}} recommends this announcer pack.
